levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 1
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor.

levels.name: Essence of Resilience Tier 4
levels.description: Connect with the Essence of Resilience and gain an advantage over valor.
levels.instruction: Your connection to the Essence of Resilience has given you greater combat abilities against valor. Spirit Nova can now be used on creatures of any essence.
